en-AU.name: Sol Share
en-AU.summary: Check your solar energy usage and surplus from your SolShare system.
en-AU.description: Ask Sol Share how much solar you're generating, whether you have surplus solar, or how your solar performed today.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Sol Share how much solar I'm getting
Alexa, ask Sol Share if there's surplus solar
Alexa, ask Sol Share how my solar did today
